Package com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.common

Class Summary
BaseSetOperateOnDiffAction BaseSetOperateOnDiffAction - extension of RhnSetAction that provides a framework for performing specified business operations on the currently selected items in the list.
BaseSetOperateOnSelectedItemsAction BaseSetOperateOnSelectedItemsAction - extension of RhnSetAction that provides a framework for performing a specified business operation on the currently selected items in the list.
DateRangePicker Action setup to handle 2 date picker forms for a start and end date.
DownloadFile ChannelPackagesAction
RhnSetAction RhnSetAction

NOTE: RhnSetAction and RhnAction contain two duplicate methods - getStrutsDelegate() and createSuccessMessage().
TinyUrlAction TinyUrlAction - action to perform internal redirect to Kickstart download files
 

Exception Summary
BadParameterException A required parameter from the request was either missing or invalid
